attributes.action: Direct funding for Good High Quality Affordable Council Homes for Rent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: break the cycle of generations of homeless among the lower paid and senior citizens caught up in this economic poverty trap and not fund private developers accontable to shareholders with prorities on profit other than people, the need is for sensible homes, sensible sizes,and sensible numbers with the necessary sustainable infrastructure that will embrace a community as to the intended high rise concrete ghettos
